synthesis_conditions.yield: 0.140 g, quantitative with respect to Mn

synthesis_conditions.solvent_amounts: 0.5 mL of MnClO4 solution in DMF (40 mM), 0.5 mL of H2bdc in DMF (40 mM), 0.5 mL of DMF/MeOH (80/20 v/v) as buffer layer, 1 mL of dpe in MeOH (20 mM)

synthesis_conditions.notes: 1⊃DMF was heated to afford 1'. It is stable and can be stored under ambient conditions.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Luz-Chem photoreactor with top and side lamps
synthesis_conditions.time: 24 h, with flipping and mixing cycles
synthesis_conditions.notes: Approximately 6 mg of 1' in powder form was placed between two glass microscopic slides and irradiated with UV radiation (λmax = 350 nm).
